intro: Sarcocapnos, commonly known as the prickly pear cactus, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Cactaceae. It is characterized by its spiny stems and clusters of yellow or orange flowers. The plants are native to arid and semi-arid regions of the Americas. They are adapted to survive in harsh environments with minimal water. Sarcocapnos species are often used in traditional medicine and for ornamental purposes.
